about_the_game:
8 Exclusive Film Grain Filters: Conquer Skull Island and pay homage to the classic Kong films with 8 exclusive film grains including the red-tinted rage filter, the 1933 noir and the 1970s sepia tone film grain versions

8 Kong Style Variants: Choose-your-own color scheme for Kong including an albino white Kong unique to the Colossal Edition of the game.

Boss Rush Mode: Conquer all the titans of Skull Island as quickly as possible and try and beat your best time in this unique-to-the colossal edition of the game.

Behind-the-Scenes Content: Exclusive to the colossal edition of the game, go behind-the-scenes for a view of the creative process featuring the concept art of Joe DeVito, live recordings of the in-game soundtrack and get an inside look at the all-original score of the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7750, Video Memory: 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5 GHz, AMD Ryzen 3 3300U, or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060, AMD RX 580, or equivalent DX11 GPU, Video Memory: 6 GB VRAM or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card.

short_description: Embark on a quest to avenge the death of your parents at the hands of the alpha predator: Gaw. This pack includes 8 exclusive film grains including a black and white noir filter, 8 Kong style variants , an exclusive boss-rush game mode, and a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the game
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch
